modName: Easy custom weapon import export guide
summary:
Just a simple guide to easier import and export weapon from nif to blender back to nif again.
without the need to use obj, dae or guessing.
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple guide to import and export weapon from nif -> blender -> nif again.

It works very similar to creating a ground / static model for those that are familiar with creating
armor mods.

This way of doing it is easier, leaves the "guessing" to a minimum and all the annoying scaling
to make everything fit.

This guide show how you change the weapon nif so that you can import it into blender and then
inject the new mesh into an original static mesh the exact same way you would do with a ground or
other static model meshes.

Note that this guide only explain this process.

If you are unfamiliar with editing (blender), creating UV maps and the use with nif skope you
might want to read other tutorials first.

This tutorial was made by BB Drac with the explicit intent of spreading the information to
others who create custom weapons.
